title: 10 acres land in Weligama
details: 8 acres land to be sold. The land is situated in Polwaththa Weligama.( Southern Province). A river ( Polwatta Ganga) flows along the full length of the land . The total extent of the land 10 acres including the river reserve. The owner is looking only Rs. 90,000/= per perch only for the 8 acres (river reserve is free) Clear deeds and ownership. 1.5 Km to Weligama town. Call 00971505017915 or 00971559406489 for more details.
